problem_name: Multiscale Modeling of Fluid Flow and Solute Transport
description: This problem involves understanding and predicting the behavior of fluids and solutes at different scales, from microscopic interactions to macroscopic flow patterns. It is particularly relevant in applications like espresso brewing, where the extraction of solubles is influenced by various factors across multiple scales.
